description: Source code for the MapVariable class, which represents a dynamic key/value map of BaseVariable types for Java or C in a code-generation framework. It includes methods for resolving references, generating encoding/decoding code in both Java and C, and manages different possible contained types.

classes.name: MapVariable
classes.description: Represents a versatile map variable supporting various contained types, with methods to resolve its references, generate encoding/decoding code in Java and C, and manage type information.

methods.name: resolveReferences
methods.description: Resolves and populates the set of possible contained types for this map based on the XML node configuration.

methods.name: isMap
methods.description: Indicates this variable is a map type, returning true.

methods.name: isPtr
methods.description: Indicates this variable is a pointer type, returning true.

methods.name: getCtype
methods.description: Returns the C type representation for this map ('icHashMap *').

methods.name: getJavaType
methods.description: Returns the Java type representation for this map ('HashMap<String,Object>').

methods.name: getValuesVarName
methods.description: Returns the variable name for the values map, e.g., 'mapNameValuesMap'.

methods.name: getTypesVarName
methods.description: Returns the variable name for the types map, e.g., 'mapNameTypesMap'.

methods.name: getJavaConstructorLines
methods.description: Generates Java constructor code to initialize the map variables.

methods.name: getJsonKey
methods.description: Returns the JSON key used for this map variable, typically the variable's name.

methods.name: getJavaGetter
methods.description: Generates Java getter methods for the map's key set, size, and each possible contained type.

methods.name: getJavaSetter
methods.description: Generates Java setter methods for inserting data into the map, for each supported type.

methods.name: getNativeGetter
methods.description: Creates C native functions to retrieve counts and values from the map, including function declarations and bodies.

methods.name: getNativeSetter
methods.description: Creates C native functions to insert values into the map, including function declarations and bodies.

methods.name: getNativeEncodeLines
methods.description: Generates C code to encode the map into JSON, handling each supported type via templates and custom functions.

methods.name: getNativeDecodeLines
methods.description: Generates C code to decode JSON into the map, handling each supported type and invoking appropriate setter functions.

methods.name: getJavaEncodeLines
methods.description: Uploads Java code for encoding the map into JSON, supporting multiple contained types.

methods.name: getJavaDecodeLines
methods.description: Uploads Java code for decoding JSON into the map, supporting multiple contained types.

methods.name: getJavaIpcObjectType
methods.description: Returns null, indicating MapVariable objects are not used directly as IPC message parameters.
